name: Libspire_serial
tagline: Library for communication with serial ports written in Vala (Windows - Linux)
body:
### Welcome to libspire_serial.
This library allows communication with devices right through serial / USB ports such as modems, sensors, bar code readers, etc.

The library is very simple and useful, written in Vala programming language that allowed me to compile without problem for both Linux and Windows.

### Authors and Contributors
The main developer of this project is edwinspire and I can contact the email edwinspire@gmail.com

### Support or Contact
If you need help or have suggestions about this project please email me at my email edwinspire@gmail.com
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
